# Laravel E-commerce Project - Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a Laravel-based e-commerce website similar to bijliwalabhai.com specializing in electrical and solar products.

## Architecture
- **Framework**: Laravel 12.x
- **Database**: MySQL/SQLite
- **Frontend**: Blade templates with Bootstrap
- **Authentication**: Laravel Breeze/Jetstream
- **Admin Panel**: Separate admin area
- **User Panel**: Customer-facing interface

## Key Features to Implement
1. **Multi-role Authentication** (Admin/Customer)
2. **Product Management** (Categories, Products, Variants)
3. **Shopping Cart & Wishlist**
4. **Order Management System**
5. **Payment Integration** (Pakistani gateways)
6. **WhatsApp Integration**
7. **Inventory Management**
8. **Sales & Discount System**

## Coding Standards
- Follow Laravel best practices
- Use Eloquent relationships properly
- Implement proper validation
- Use Service classes for business logic
- Follow RESTful API conventions
- Use Laravel's built-in security features

## Database Design
- Users (customers and admins)
- Categories (hierarchical)
- Products (with variants)
- Orders & Order Items
- Cart & Wishlist
- Payments & Transactions

## UI/UX Guidelines
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Clean, modern interface
- Fast loading times
- SEO optimized
- Pakistani currency (PKR) support
